episodes.description:

episodes.title: Exclusive Answers from Heavens Gate Cult Member!
episodes.description:
In this video, I present insights from a reddit post with questions emailed directly to a Heaven's Gate member, who astonishingly responded within just a few hours. Discover the ideologies, motivations, and perspectives of those within this elusive community as they shed light on their unconventional beliefs.

episodes.title: Meditation Guru Is Secretly A Cult Leader
episodes.description:
In this video, we delve into the intriguing and controversial story of Zen Master Rama and the spiritual movement that he led starting in the 1980s. Zen Master Rama, also known as Dr. Frederick Lenz, was a complex figure who garnered both followers and critics during his lifetime. He later drowned himself in an apparent suicide, in protest of how spiritual leaders are treated in the United States.￼

This video explores the history, beliefs, and It delves into the allegations of it being described as a cult, examining the experiences of former members.

Please be aware that the content of this video is intended for informational and educational purposes.

Subscribe to our channel to stay informed about our ongoing explorations into various aspects of spirituality, Cult culture, and Cult history. Share your thoughts and experiences related to this topic and join us in shedding light on the intricate history of Zen Master Rama's spiritual journey.

- Disclaimer - Captions are AI Generated, Text may not be portrayed as it is discussed in the video!
